com.codecool.shop.dao

Class JDBC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.dao.JDBC
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProductCategoryDaoJDBC, ProductDaoJDBC, ShoppingCartDaoJDBC, SupplierDaoJDBC

    public abstract class JDBC
extends java.lang.Object

    This abstract class is used to give database related methods to the daojdbc classes via inheritance

    The main purpose of this class was giving the the most used methods for the jdbc implementation classes, via inheritance. Such as connecting to the database, executing queries.
    Since:
    2017-05-20
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Majoross Daniel, Racz Anna, Adam Kovacs

      A method for hanadling privacy of the users passwords of the database.

        public JDBC()

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        protected java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is used to establish a connection to the database
        Returns:
        returns the connection with properties called from the read() method
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - for handling database related issues.

      • executeQuery

        protected void executeQuery(java.lang.String query)
        This method is responsible to forward sql queries to the database.
        Parameters:
        query - sql queries created in the JDBC classes.

      • read

        protected java.lang.String read(int paramNumber)
        A method for hanadling privacy of the users passwords of the database. This method reads the related information from the connection.properties file, which was put in git ignore.
        Parameters:
        paramNumber - for indicating the method which line is needed: 1 is the URL, 2 is the database name, 3 user name 4 is password.
        Returns:
        returns the requested information, or null if some problem occurs.
